segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring water out, overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman? She's totally zoned out drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, but no reaction at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy climbing the stool like a pro thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping, but he's focused on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand deep in there, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, palm up, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this sneak right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, totally contrasting the inside frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, cabinets openâ€”it's all so unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple kitchen could hide so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
